message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Alice, $12,000 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,500.  What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $8,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high at $9,500. I'm sticking to my offer of $8,500. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to go with John.
